day, a four-year-old boy came to a sudden realization: the world is not fair. Eighty percent of the world's population wield special abilities, known as \"quirks,\" which have given many the power to make their childhood dreams of becoming a superhero a reality. Unfortunately, Izuku Midoriya was one of the few born without a quirk, suffering from discrimination because of it. Yet, he refuses to give up on his dream of becoming a hero; determined to do the impossible, Izuku sets his sights on the elite hero training academy, UA High.  \n  \nHowever, everything changes after a chance meeting with the number one hero and Izuku's idol, All Might. Discovering that his dream is not a dead end, the powerless boy undergoes special training, working harder than ever before. Eventually, this leads to him inheriting All Might's power, and with his newfound abilities, gets into his school of choice, beginning his grueling journey to become the successor of the best hero on the planet.\n___\n**Note: Because a takedown notice was sent to MangaDex from the owners of this series, fan translations of My Hero Academia are currently unavailable to be uploaded. The series can be read in its entirety at [the official Shonen Jump website](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/my-hero-academia), with the first and latest three chapters available at any time and the rest accessible with a Shonen Jump membership (which costs about $2 a month and can be accessed via a VPN if you are outside the US). The three most recent chapters can also be read on MANGA Plus for free at the link below.**","es":"Un día, un niño de cuatro años se dio cuenta de repente: el mundo no es justo. El 80% de la población mundial posee habilidades especiales, conocidas como «quirks», que han dado a muchos el poder de hacer realidad sus sueños infantiles de convertirse en superhéroes. Por desgracia, Izuku Midoriya fue uno de los pocos que nació sin una «quirk», sufriendo discriminación por ello. Sin embargo, se niega a renunciar a su sueño de convertirse en un héroe; decidido a hacer lo imposible, Izuku pone sus miras en la academia de entrenamiento de héroes de élite, UA High.  \n  \nSin embargo, todo cambia tras un encuentro casual con el héroe número uno e ídolo de Izuku, All Might. Al descubrir que su sueño no es un callejón sin salida, el chico sin poderes se somete a un entrenamiento especial, esforzándose más que nunca. Finalmente, esto le lleva a heredar el poder de All Might y, con sus nuevas habilidades, consigue entrar en la escuela de su elección, comenzando su agotador viaje para convertirse en el sucesor del mejor héroe del planeta.","es-la":"Un día, un niño de cuatro años se dio cuenta de repente: el mundo no es justo. El 80% de la población mundial posee habilidades especiales, conocidas como «quirks», que han dado a muchos el poder de hacer realidad sus sueños infantiles de convertirse en superhéroes. Por desgracia, Izuku Midoriya fue uno de los pocos que nació sin una «quirk», sufriendo discriminación por ello. Sin embargo, se niega a renunciar a su sueño de convertirse en un héroe; decidido a hacer lo imposible, Izuku pone sus miras en la academia de entrenamiento de héroes de élite, UA High.  \n  \nSin embargo, todo cambia tras un encuentro casual con el héroe número uno e ídolo de Izuku, All Might. Al descubrir que su sueño no es un callejón sin salida, el chico sin poderes se somete a un entrenamiento especial, esforzándose más que nunca. Finalmente, esto le lleva a heredar el poder de All Might y, con sus nuevas habilidades, consigue entrar en la escuela de su elección, comenzando su agotador viaje para convertirse en el sucesor del mejor héroe del planeta.","fr":"Dans un monde où 80 % de la population possède un super-pouvoir appelé alter, les héros font partie de la vie quotidienne. Et les super-vilains aussi ! Face à eux se dresse l’invincible All Might, le plus puissant des héros ! Le jeune Izuku Midoriya en est un fan absolu. Il n’a qu’un rêve : entrer à la Hero Academia pour suivre les traces de son idole.\nLe problème, c’est qu’il fait partie des 20 % qui n’ont aucun pouvoir…\n\nSon destin est bouleversé le jour où sa route croise celle d’All Might en personne ! Ce dernier lui offre une chance inespérée de voir son rêve se réaliser. Pour Izuku, le parcours du combattant ne fait que commencer !\n\n---\n\nMaison d'édition FR : **Ki-oon**","pt-br":"Em um mundo onde quase toda a população possui algum poder sobre-humano, Izuku Midoriya é um dos poucos casos de pessoas comuns. Mas esse não é o maior de seus problemas. Exatamente por ser desprovido de qualquer poder, Izuku sofre constantemente nas mãos de seus colegas de classe. Nesse mundo fictício, desde o primeiro caso constatado de um recém-nascido com algum tipo de poder, o índice de criminalidade cresceu proporcional ao surgimento de heróis com as mais variadas capacidades. E, como não poderia deixar de ser, o sonho de Izuku é se tornar um super-herói. Isso parecia impossível, até o dia que ele ajuda o poderoso All Might na captura de um vilão gosmento. Ao demonstrar grande coragem e um forte senso de justiça, com a ajuda do famoso herói de cabelos louros, o garoto enfim terá a chance de se tornar quem sempre sonhou!","ru":"Манга повествует о мире, где больший процент населения человечества рождается с необычной способностью (называется это - причуда), но наш главный герой в этот процент не попал. Stuck in a strange country with no friends, how will she be able to return home?  \n  \nAfter hearing a tale of death in the river only to return to life with her help, Jacheongbi realizes her way home is through the river! Rather than returning outside where it’s full of danger, she remains in the place where she awoke. A situation in-which her mind couldn’t be made up…   \n  \nA handsome crown prince, her savior the Prince of Misfortune, and the playful, tomboy princess who claimed ownership of Jacheongbi— She begins preparing for a quick, safe return home…"},"links":{"al":"125598","ap":"itan-empires-jacheongbi","mu":"173145","raw":"https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.nhn?productNo=5574817"},"originalLanguage":"ko","publicationDemographic":"shoujo","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"0bc90acb-ccc1-44ca-a34a-b9f3a73259d0","name":{"en":"Reincarnation"}},{"id":"33771934-028e-4cb3-8744-691e866a923e","name":{"en":"Historical"}},{"id":"3e2b8dae-350e-4ab8-a8ce-016e844b9f0d","name":{"en":"Long Strip"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"ace04997-f6bd-436e-b261-779182193d3d","name":{"en":"Isekai"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"e197df38-d0e7-43b5-9b09-2842d0c326dd","name":{"en":"Web Comic"}},{"id":"f5ba408b-0e7a-484d-8d49-4e9125ac96de","name":{"en":"Full Color"}}]}

508e5b30-2bee-4eb5-9970-258027216357:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"508e5b30-2bee-4eb5-9970-258027216357","title":{"en":"Gekiga Yose: Fallen Words"},"altTitles":[{"ja-ro":"Gekiga Yose: Shibahama"},{"ja-ro":"Shibahama"},{"ja":"劇画寄席 芝浜"}],"lastChapter":"8","availableTranslatedLanguages":["en"],"description":{"en":"*Currently Out-of-Print with no digital edition from Drawn \u0026 Quarterly*\n\nIn Fallen Words, Yoshihiro Tatsumi takes up the oral tradition of rakugo and breathes new life into it by shifting the format from spoken word to manga. Each of the eight stories in the collection is lifted from the Edo-era Japanese storytelling form. As Tatsumi notes in the afterword, the world of rakugo, filled with mystery, emotion, revenge, hope, and, of course, love, overlaps perfectly with the world of Gekiga that he has spent the better part of his life developing.  \n  \nThese slice-of-life stories resonate with modern readers thanks to their comedic elements and familiarity with human idiosyncrasies. In one, a father finds his son too bookish and arranges for two workers to take the young man to a brothel on the pretext of visiting a new shrine. In another particularly beloved rakugo tale, a married man falls in love with a prostitute. When his wife finds out, she is enraged and sets a curse on the other woman. The prostitute responds by cursing the wife, and the two escalate in a spiral of voodoo doll cursing. Soon both are dead, but even death can’t extinguish their jealousy.  \n  \nTatsumi’s love of wordplay shines through in the telling of these whimsical stories, and yet he still offers timeless insight into human nature."},"links":{"al":"66753","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/4862381391","ap":"fallen-words","cdj":"https://www.cdjapan.co.jp/product/NEOBK-571195","kt":"gekiga-yose-shibahama","mal":"36753","mu":"71863"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"seinen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"33771934-028e-4cb3-8744-691e866a923e","name":{"en":"Historical"}},{"id":"3b60b75c-a2d7-4860-ab56-05f391bb889c","name":{"en":"Psychological"}},{"id":"489dd859-9b61-4c37-af75-5b18e88daafc","name":{"en":"Ninja"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"51d83883-4103-437c-b4b1-731cb73d786c","name":{"en":"Anthology"}},{"id":"81183756-1453-4c81-aa9e-f6e1b63be016","name":{"en":"Samurai"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}},{"id":"ac72833b-c4e9-4878-b9db-6c8a4a99444a","name":{"en":"Military"}},{"id":"b1e97889-25b4-4258-b28b-cd7f4d28ea9b","name":{"en":"Philosophical"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}},{"id":"eabc5b4c-6aff-42f3-b657-3e90cbd00b75","name":{"en":"Supernatural"}},{"id":"ee968100-4191-4968-93d3-f82d72be7e46","name":{"en":"Mystery"}},{"id":"f8f62932-27da-4fe4-8ee1-6779a8c5edba","name":{"en":"Tragedy"}}]}

Hell Saturn prays to the Black Solar God and is rewarded with a revived Queen Hedrian now a cyborg with a mechanical heart and a metallic afro. But plot after plot of Black Magma, even with Hedrian's aid, fails. Following the death of 01, Amazon Killer, a Vader, arrives from space, destroying the Sun Vulcan Base. A new Vulcan Base is built.\n\nThe original Vul-Eagle, Ryuusuke Oowashi, is replaced by a friend and master of the sword, Takayuki Hiba (who first appeared on episode 23). The team successfully defends the psychic descendant of the Denzi, the nun Himiko, from Black Magma. Shortly after this, Inazuma Ginga shows up. Sun Vulcan devises the New Vulcan Ball but their attacks are no use against Inazuma Ginga until he becomes the gigantic Inazuma Monger. Finally, the trio and their commander go to the North Pole to rescue Arashiyama Misa and succeed not only in doing so (despite a fake Misa to confuse them) but also in defeating the Omnipotent God, the true leader of Black Magma, by feigning surrender and striking when it lowers its guard."},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"50880a9d-5440-4732-9afb-8f457127e836","name":{"en":"Mecha"}},{"id":"f4122d1c-3b44-44d0-9936-ff7502c39ad3","name":{"en":"Adaptation"}}]}

50d1df01-8c55-4d87-95bf-965e45338b45:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"50d1df01-8c55-4d87-95bf-965e45338b45","title":{"en":"To Die In June"},"altTitles":[{"ja-ro":"Minazuki ni Shisu"},{"ja":"水無月に死す"}],"lastChapter":"10.5","availableTranslatedLanguages":["en"],"description":{"en":"Author's Notes:  \n  \nWhether it’s wanting to kill someone  \nor being in a time when people die,  \ndeath makes really good material for a story,  \nso I set out to draw “a manga where people enjoy dying.” Not that it’s enjoyable.  \nThis grew out of a piece I did for the group exhibition “Seira Fuku Kyouten” (Sailor Uniform Scriptures) held in Osaka, “Umi Yukaba”. I just couldn’t forget about the anachronous girls in uniform.  \n  \nLike a painter depicting love, death, war, and faith, I felt like I wandered off all of those themes. And so I’ve put all of those into this work. What makes up the core of this story are themes like girlhood and motherhood, birth and loss, and various beliefs.  \n  \nMuch like my previous “La Sagrada Familia”, I put together a squad of 12 girl soldiers. Their names are inspired by suicide weapons and the calendar months. (For example Satsukibara Nae is taken from Satsuki(Naezuki) which means May)  \nI drew the boat in the middle using a plastic model.  \n  \nWhat’s a girl riding in the woman boat on the mother ocean? A girl, that’s all!  \nPlease enjoy this story, of naive girls who haven’t yet discovered themselves, of love and war and revolution. And I would be delighted if you could watch over their battle until the very end."},"links":{"kt":"55438","mu":"150546","raw":"https://www.pixiv.net/user/2416020/series/6858"},"originalLanguage":"ja","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"a3c67850-4684-404e-9b7f-c69850ee5da6","name":{"en":"Girls' Love"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"f8f62932-27da-4fe4-8ee1-6779a8c5edba","name":{"en":"Tragedy"}}]}

Adding more to the confusion, Theodore keeps calling Elle his “master” and has been appointed as the deputy commander’s aide without her knowledge. But despite his wolfish reputation, Theodore acts oddly tame when it comes to the dame he serves. Just what intentions could this knight be hiding behind his sharp-toothed grin?\n\n---\nElle Louise Therese was the most outstanding knight of the Raun Empire. At a party, she witnessed the affair of her fiancé and called off their engagement. El, who's in deep sorrow due to the shock, lost consciousness and collapsed. 50e0025c-8747-4edd-987d-baabf2caeb67:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"50e0025c-8747-4edd-987d-baabf2caeb67","title":{"en":"Isn't Being a Wicked Woman Much Better?"},"altTitles":[{"ko":"악녀라서 편하고 좋은데요?"},{"ko-ro":"Angnyeoraseo Pyeonhago Joeundeyo?"},{"en":"The Perks of Being a Villainess"},{"en":"What's Wrong with Being the Villainess?"},{"en":"Being a Wicked Woman Is Much Better"},{"en":"Being a Wicked Woman Is Comfortable and Pleasant"},{"fr":"Not So Bad to Be Bad!"},{"pt":"Ser uma vilã não é muito melhor?"},{"es-la":"¿No es mucho mejor ser una mujer malvada?"},{"hr":"Nije li bolje biti zlikovac?"},{"uk":"Чи не краще бути негідницею?"},{"th":"เป็นนางร้ายก็สบายดีนะคะ"},{"ja":"悪女は楽で最高ですが？"},{"zh":"做个恶女好安逸?"},{"zh":"因为是恶女所以很舒服"},{"zh":"当恶女很舒服很好啊？"},{"zh-hk":"當個惡女輕鬆又愉快"},{"vi":"Làm ác nữ bộ không tuyệt sao?"}],"availableTranslatedLanguages":["en","hr","es-la","pl"],"description":{"en":"She possessed a villainess who is known and hated for her evil acts in an unpopular novel. But because of her personality, it was extremely difficult for her to play the villainess role. But not for long…\n\n“I’ll fix your dress according to your taste this instant!”\n\n“My request.”\n\n“O-Of course! As per your request, there’s only one piece available in the whole Empire.”\n\nPeople around me listen to me well even if I just frown and sit still. Since I don’t have to live in difficulty, I decided to just comfortably live on as a villainess.\n\n“Father. Is it necessary for you to solve formulas in this slow and inefficient way?”\n\nI thought it would be good to be a rich villainess, so I used all my knowledge.\n\n“Why don’t you give me the honor of escorting the Princess?”\n\nI have had enough of dealing with my father, so why did an unexpected character suddenly appear? What if this person disrupts my plan?\n\n---\nDohee lived as a pushover, died miserably, and was reborn in a novel as a notorious villainess. But it turns out that her new life is not without its perks, as Deborah Seymour is also the richest villain alive. Now, all that's left for her to do is lay low and enjoy her carefree lifestyle...if not for the fact that Deborah is fated to be sent to a monastery! Will this ex-doormat find a way to avoid yet another tragic ending, or will the challenges of being a villainess be too much for her?\n\n---\n**Links:**\n\n**Original Novel:** [Korean / 한국어](https://page.kakao.com/content/55527274), [English](https://tapas.io/series/the-perks-of-being-a-villainess-novel/info)\n\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%95%85%EB%85%80%EB%9D%BC%EC%84%9C-%ED%8E%B8%ED%95%98%EA%B3%A0-%EC%A2%8B%EC%9D%80%EB%8D%B0%EC%9A%94/3100), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60728286)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://tapas.io/series/the-perks-of-being-a-villainess/info)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://pdt.tencentac.com/?adtag=appshare.ios.detail%26QQ%26404\u0026contentId=404\u0026platform=IA)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E7%95%B6%E5%80%8B%E6%83%A1%E5%A5%B3%E8%BC%95%E9%AC%86%E5%8F%88%E6%84%89%E5%BF%AB/446)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/The-Perks-of-Being-a-Villainess/656)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/134441)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%9B%E0%B9%87%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%81%E0%B9%87%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B0%E0%B8%84%E0%B8%B0/509)","fr":"Dohee a vécu comme une poule mouillée, a péri misérablement et a été réincarnée dans un roman en tant que vilaine notoire. Dohee, studentica arhitektonskog fakulteta, otkriva da ju njezine kolege i obitelj iskorištavaju za novac i kao besplatnu radnu snagu točno prije nego pogine u prometnoj nesreći.\nUmjesto da zapravo umre ona se reinkarnira u ljubavni roman koji je nedavno čitala, ali ne kao glavni lik, nego kao glavni zlikovac i antagonist knjige Deborah Seymour.\nSada kao Deborah ona navigira novi život odmarajući se u bogatstu i raskoši, ali mora biti na oprezu jer je njezina reputacija duboko pod zemljom, a lik Debore u originalnoj knjizi završava svoju priču u tamnici.","id":"Kehidupan Yoon Dohee, wanita naif yang kerap dimanfaatkan oleh orang sekitarnya berubah drastis. Setelah dia mengalami kecelakaan dan sekarat, dia merasuk ke dalam tubuh wanita jahat bernama Deborah Seymour. Deborah Seymour adalah seorang tokoh di novel reverse harem rating 19+ berjudul 'A Dark Thorn Through My Throat'. Karena tidak ingin ada orang lain yang tahu kalau sebenarnya Yoon Dohee adalah wanita naif, dia akhirnya belajar untuk menjadi jahat seperti Deborah Seymour. \"Aku tidak akan hidup sebagai orang yang baik dan menyedihkan seperti di masa lalu. Aku akan terus hidup enak sebagai wanita jahat!\"\n\n---\n**Links:**\n\n**Original Novel:** [Korean / 한국어](https://page.kakao.com/content/55527274), [English](https://tapas.io/series/the-perks-of-being-a-villainess-novel/info)\n\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%95%85%EB%85%80%EB%9D%BC%EC%84%9C-%ED%8E%B8%ED%95%98%EA%B3%A0-%EC%A2%8B%EC%9D%80%EB%8D%B0%EC%9A%94/3100), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60728286)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://tapas.io/series/the-perks-of-being-a-villainess/info)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://pdt.tencentac.com/?adtag=appshare.ios.detail%26QQ%26404\u0026contentId=404\u0026platform=IA)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E7%95%B6%E5%80%8B%E6%83%A1%E5%A5%B3%E8%BC%95%E9%AC%86%E5%8F%88%E6%84%89%E5%BF%AB/446)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/The-Perks-of-Being-a-Villainess/656)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/134441)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%9B%E0%B9%87%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%81%E0%B9%87%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B0%E0%B8%84%E0%B8%B0/509)","uk":"Ду Хі опанувала тіло лиходійки одного непопулярного роману, яка була відома і ненависна всім за свої погані вчинки. Але через власний характер їй дуже важко правильно грати роль злодійки. Але ненадовго.. \n\n\"Я зміню сукню згідно з вашим смаком негайно\" \n\n\"Моє прохання.\" \n\n\"З-звісно! Згідно з вашим запитом, у всій імперії є лише одна річ.\" \n\nЛюди навколо мене добре слухають, навіть якщо я просто хмурюсь і сиджу на місці. Оскільки мені не доводиться жити в труднощах, я вирішила просто комфортно жити у тілі лиходійки. \n\n«Батько, чи потрібно вам розв’язувати формули таким повільним і неефективним способом?» \n\nЯ подумала, що було б добре бути багатою негідницею, тому використовувала усі свої знання. \n\n«Чому б вам не надати мені честь супроводжувати принцесу?» \n\nУ мене досить багато справ з батьком, так чому раптом з’явився цей неочікуваний персонаж? 50f5332b-020f-4fad-8280-9f863843194c:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"50f5332b-020f-4fad-8280-9f863843194c","title":{"en":"This Love Is Like a Song"},"altTitles":[{"zh":"此爱如歌"},{"zh-ro":"Cǐ Ài Rú Gē"},{"ms":"Cinta Ini Bagaikan Lagu"}],"lastChapter":"60","availableTranslatedLanguages":["en"],"description":{"en":"The capital’s unparalled hero, the one whose name resonated across the lands, Ling Yunge, had battled and won the world for the man she loved the most. She elevated him to become the crown prince, but in exchange all he gave her was deceit and lies. In her sorrow and pain, she disappeared. However, they soon discover that force alone is not enough, it's character, individuality, that rules this school and pits the students against each other in a brutal contest of dueling personalities vying for supremacy. Because in this school, those with the superior strength, the superior character, are king, and those whose individualities are overwhelmed are discarded. Join Kagyuu, Kamo, and their companions as they struggle to overcome the hidden evils lurking within this school, and discover the voice of each other's hearts and true desires.  \n  \nDo not edit genre to Shounen, series serialized in a seinen magazine (Weekly Young Jump)\n\n- [Wikipedia](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E3%81%AD%E3%81%98%E3%81%BE%E3%81%8D%E3%82%AB%E3%82%AE%E3%83%A5%E3%83%BC)"},"links":{"al":"73525","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/gp/product/B074CJVX2J","ap":"nejimaki-kagyu","bw":"series/16062/list","cdj":"https://www.cdjapan.co.jp/product/NEOBK-959757","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/236391/","kt":"23560","mal":"43525","mu":"63542"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"seinen","contentRating":"suggestive","tags":[{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"3b60b75c-a2d7-4860-ab56-05f391bb889c","name":{"en":"Psychological"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"799c202e-7daa-44eb-9cf7-8a3c0441531e","name":{"en":"Martial Arts"}},{"id":"aafb99c1-7f60-43fa-b75f-fc9502ce29c7","name":{"en":"Harem"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"caaa44eb-cd40-4177-b930-79d3ef2afe87","name":{"en":"School Life"}},{"id":"cdad7e68-1419-41dd-bdce-27753074a640","name":{"en":"Horror"}}]}
